\t\t We just need your registered email-id to send you password reset!

Dent And Paint:-


*	 The only multi brand service provider to give 3 months
		 insurance on panel
 *	 PPG Asian grade 1 DuPont paint used by our car
		 garages in Solapur
 *	 1 year paint warranty
 *	 Top quality at best price
 *	 Car bumper repair/ replacement service
 *	 Accidental car repairs at lowest price
 *	 Pickup and drop from any location in Solapur
 *	 Guaranteed same day car delivery
 *	 100% customer satisfaction
 *	 Garages specializing in minor scratches, car denting 
		 and painting in Solapur
 *	 Multiple quotation to choose from different garages


		 Car Interior Cleaning:-


*	 Comprehensive service right at your doorstep
 *	 Scrubbing and cleaning of the floormats
 *	 Vacuuming of the floor area, roof area and dickey
 *	 Cleaning of the seats using insdustry standard
		 chemicals
 *	 Scrubbing and cleaning of all door panels with
		 microfiber cloth
 *	 Waxing and polishing of the dashboard
 *	 One litre of water and an electricity point is required


		Convenient Car Servicing and Repairs:-


*	 30% cost saving on car servicing in Solapur
 *	 100% transparent process
 *	 Genuine OES/OEM parts with warranty used in all
		 garages
 *	 79 point inspection at your doorstep from industry
		 expert service advisors
 *	 Instant detail car health inspection report
 *	 Post inspection get quotations from a multi brand,
		 local and authorised center
 *	 30+ garage network spread across Solapur
 *	 Most trusted car service center in Solapur with many
		 happy customers
 *	 Free pick, work supervision at the garage and drop
		 from your home or office


		 Tyre replacement, Wheel alignment, Wheel balancing:-


*	 Wheel rotation to prevent uneven wear and tear
 *	 Wheel alignment ensures durability of the wheel
 *	 Wheel balancing ensures a smooth and safe drive
 *	 Free pickup and drop service i.e we picked up your car
		 get your tyre replaced and drop your
		 car back to your place
 *	 Discounted price on tyres


		 Battery Services:-


*	 Doorstep car battery replacement
 *	 Car battry jump start
 *	 Doorstep car battery checkup


		 Second Hand Car Inspection:-


*	 79 point inspection of your used car
 *	 Industry expert advisors with over 10 years experience
 *	 Diagnosis to let you know whether or not to purchase
		 the car


		 Insurance Renewal:-


*	 Multiple brands to choose from
 *	 Multiple quotes in 24 hours
 *	 Expertise to find the ideal plan for you


		 Car A/C Services:-


*	 High quality maintenence and cooling guarantee
 *	 A/C Compressor Check
 *	 A/C Leak Test
 *	 A/C Gas Recharge
